description: Diao implements a Deliverance like language using a pure        XSLT engine. With Diao, you compile your theme and ruleset in one        step, then use a superfastsimple transform on each request thereafter.        Alternatively, compile your theme during development, check it into        Subversion, and not touch Diao during deployment.

info.Author:: Paul Everitt, Laurence Rowe and Martin Aspeli.

longdescription: Diao implements a Deliverance like language using a pure        XSLT engine. With Diao, you compile your theme and ruleset in one        step, then use a superfastsimple transform on each request thereafter.        Alternatively, compile your theme during development, check it into        Subversion, and not touch Diao during deployment.
